Description:
Purpose of the job:To strengthen Product channel and marketing tool development and management.
To develop / monitor / expand the channel and Marketing coverage by working closely with the Sales team with marketing plans.
Additional responsibility will include assisting Business Head in various aspects of Marketing Budget Management.Key Objectives:The successful applicant is responsible for:Maintaining & developing the business with clear objective of achieving the company’s marketing tool development and new product planning in the Division.
Carry out all marketing activities related to the division.
Budgeting, Planning, execution and monitoring product’s.
Plan and create the marketing communication asset to achieve the IMC (Integrated Marketing Communication) strategy.
Develop the execution strategy to ensure that the marketing communication asset is used organically and multi dimension-ally at all touch points.Position Responsibilities:Marketing Budget Management:Quarterly/Monthly budget planning (product and market wise) for company budgets within company’s deadline.
Monthly evaluation of the marketing spends (market, budget and product wise) covering ATL and BTL activities (ATL/ BTL portion management as per company guideline).
Monthly Budget management: Plan proposal with (TIM %) Total Investment to Market guide.Marketing Activities and Reporting:Recommend the measures to enhance the quality of Product display.
Development of in store material for all the product categories.
Maintenance of good level of Samsung display & products in stores – keeps records of distribution of special displays, pops (point of sales materials)
Manage all ATL.
Weekly marketing activity reports to be prepared and circulated to all concerned in SAMSUNG Levant and HQ.
Arrange and coordinate product launches.
Coordinate product reviews and PR activities with PR Manager.
Prepare and execute plans for marketing assigned products or product line(s), with the ultimate objective to achieve or exceed company goals.
Work closely with Brand Marketing to assure consistency with established guidelines.
Participate in decisions regarding product positioning and advertising campaigns.
Develop budget for assigned area of responsibility, and operate within established budget guidelines.
Maintain high level of brand preference and awareness.
Participate in close communication with the agencies by delivering clear briefings, thus deriving ideas that align with the communication strategy and the output wanted.
Analyze the communication impact through before and after consumer research.Skills
Skills:
A track record of success within LEVANT is essential and minimum 4 years’ experience in consumer electronics industry in the same position.
Bachelor / Master degree in business, Marketing, Advertisement or any related field.
Analysis and Proposal, Persuasion, Negotiation skills.
Excellent quantitative aptitude, commercial acumen.
Good PC skills- Excel, PowerPoint and good presentation skills is a must.
Understanding of the local market is required hence local experience will be preferred.
Knowledge of some or all of products: Audio/Video, IT, Home Appliances.
Ability to perform and work under different conditions and a team player.

Fluent Arabic & English Language, excellent negotiation skills.
Ability to read, analyzes, and interprets sales/financial reports, data and studies.
Ability to respond to common inquiries or complaints from customers, distributors, or members of the business community.
Ability to effectively present information to top management, public groups and/or clients.
In the whole process of recruitment, job applicants should be careful not to infringe the trade secret of the company which they have been/were working for.
